interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Summer Crystal Hair Clip Unicorn Sparkling Sequins Alligator Clip Hair Accessory, For Women and Girls, Made in Korea, Daily, Party, Cosplay (Multi-Colored)
Review Date: 2021/08/14
Store: Summer Crystal
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Summer Crystal', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Alligator', 'Embellishment': 'Crystal', 'Product Dimensions': '3.25 x 2.75 x 0.75 inches; 0.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '758358995539'}
Review Text: I ordered this clip for my 3-year-old daughter.  She loves unicorns and loves this clip with the multi-colored sequins.  It is a little big in her hair but it works fine with a ponytail.  The clip is a metal alligator clip which can pull at the hair, but if you're careful it's fine.  The clip stays well in the hair.  I think it's a little overpriced for one hair clip, but it is a fun clip.
Review Title: Pretty sequins
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Headbands For Kids MINNIE Sequins Hair MOUSE Girls Baby EARS Bow knot (Red and Black) Toptree {'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'Toptree', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Item Form': 'Ribbon', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 3.58 x 0.94 inches; 0.74 Ounces', 'UPC': '710654129025'} So excited for my daughter to wear these for her first trip to Disney! 8months old and they look adorable on her! Fits great!

UPDATE - my daughter wore these to Disney World and we received SO many compliments on them. I actually prefer these for her age over the overpriced options at the park. Perfect for Disney trip! N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml) No Name Necessary {'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Specialty': 'Mattifying', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} I am typically low maintenance with make up but wanted to try this product as I live in the sweltering heat of south Florida year round. First thing I noticed is this is a very nice sized bottle, almost as big as a standard can of hairspray. I have been using this product for a week now and have definitely noticed a difference. My pores are less noticeable and my makeup lasts much longer than without the product. My face looks and feels smooth all day. It’s so easy to use too! All you have to do is shake it up and spray your face several times before applying makeup. I haven’t noticed a scent to it and barely notice the product at all when I spray it on. Now I just wish I had a travel size to take with me on upcoming trips! I definitely recommend giving this a try! Great product, face stays looking fresh all day 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult) Vedory ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.'] {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'} I work in a school that currently requires everyone to wear masks when on property. These mask brackets have really helped me feel more comfortable to wear a mask all day. I also find it much easier to speak and be heard with this bracket.

These are the second set of brackets I have tried and I feel like these fit my face much better than other ones. It took some getting used to as it doesn’t clip into my non pleated masks and sometimes moves around, but I am definitely liking using these better than nothing. I have shared extras with coworkers and they have all found them to be helpful. I would recommend. Helps when wearing mask all day Christmas Headbands for Women,Glitter headbands Sequence Red and Green,Holiday Costume Headwear Handmade Mouse Ears Hairband Hair Decorations for Girl Party Cosplay Favor Accessories YanJie {'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Occasion': 'Christmas, Party, Birthday, Thanksgiving', 'Material': 'Cotton Blend', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'YanJie', 'Package Dimensions': '10.12 x 7.6 x 1.22 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '751300682099'} This headband is so cute! It fits my adult head and my 2 year old’s head well. It is extremely comfortable to wear and doesn’t dig into the sides of your head. The headband is covered in satin so it’s soft. It can fall down pretty easily because there are no combs to hold it in place but I’ll take that inconvenience for the comfort! It is decently made, not real high quality, but for the price it’s fair. Much cheaper than buying ones inside parks! I definitely recommend this! Very cute and comfortable Curly Hair Brush For Thick Hair.Kids Hair Brush Detangler.Unicorn Hair Brush Set.Protects Against Split Ends And Breakage For All Hair Types.For Women,Men,Wet And Dry Hair. Duhpofc {'Brand': 'Duhpofc', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Rubber', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Dry, Curly, Thick', 'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 3.58 x 1.77 inches; 5.08 Ounces'} This hairbrush set is perfect for my 3 year old daughter! She loves mermaids and unicorns so was very excited to get this hairbrush. The hairbrush works very well in her hair and easily detangles the hair. It is easy to hold and seems very well made. The brush comes with coil hair ties. I have never used these before but they are just the right size for my daughter’s hair and they are great! They hold the hair well and don’t damage it like rubber bands do. There is also a small jar of butterfly clips which my daughter likes. These are not very well made as we already had one break but they are a nice bonus to this set. I definitely recommend for a younger child! Great for young child INH Hi-Lites Lavender | Colored Hair Extensions Vegan Clip In Purple Hair Extensions For Women - 2 pieces, 20 inch INH {'Brand': 'INH', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'UPC': '810073150256'} I ordered these color hair pieces for my 3 year old daughter to have fun with. She was very excited to add some purple to her hair! I cut the extensions pretty easily to match her hair length. You bend the small comb clips to open them and then clip them in the hair. The clips did not stay in place in my daughters hair. They were also extremely noticeable which was disappointing. My daughter has thinner blonde hair which probably makes it harder. These would work better with thicker and darker hair. I personally think they are over priced for the quality. I would not order again. Very noticeable clip in hair DARKLATER Butterfly Hair Clips for Girls,for Toddler Girls,Baby Girls and Women,Cute Hair Clips,Beautiful Hair Accessories,12 PCS DARKLATER {'Brand': 'DARKLATER', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Babies', 'Embellishment': 'Glitter', 'Theme': 'Butterfly', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3.35 x 0.67 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '750081432770'} I ordered these hair clips for my 3 year old daughter who loves butterflies. This pack comes with 12 different colored butterfly alligator clips. The alligator clips are fully covered with a matching ribbon so they do not get easily tangled in hair or damage the hair. The clip is sturdy and stays put when in the hair. The butterfly wings are made of two layers of a very thin fabric. They are transparent but the colors are beautiful. The butterfly bodies are different glitter colors which adds just the right amount of sparkle to these clips. I think these clips are very pretty and so much fun for a young child or an adult who enjoys butterflies. They are not the highest quality but I think priced appropriately for a se lot of 12. Pretty clips Summer Crystal Hair Clip Sparkling Sequins, Double-Layered Alligator Clip Hair Bow Accessory For Women and Girls, Made in Korea, Daily, Party, Cosplay (Holographic) Summer Crystal {'Brand': 'Summer Crystal', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Polyester, Cotton', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 2.5 x 1 inches; 0.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '758358995591'} I ordered this bow for my 3-year-old daughter. She was very excited to get it as she loves the fun rainbow sequins on it. The bow is a little large for her, but she can wear it fine with a ponytail. There is a metal alligator clip on the back that can pull at the hair, but if you are careful when putting it in and taking it out it is fine. I really like this bow, but I believe it is a bit overpriced for 1 bow. I would not pay the current price for this single bow, maybe for a 3 pack or more. Fun sequin bow Summer Crystal Hair Clip Unicorn Sparkling Sequins Alligator Clip Hair Accessory, For Women and Girls, Made in Korea, Daily, Party, Cosplay (Multi-Colored) Summer Crystal {'Brand': 'Summer Crystal', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Alligator', 'Embellishment': 'Crystal', 'Product Dimensions': '3.25 x 2.75 x 0.75 inches; 0.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '758358995539'} I ordered this clip for my 3-year-old daughter. She loves unicorns and loves this clip with the multi-colored sequins. It is a little big in her hair but it works fine with a ponytail. The clip is a metal alligator clip which can pull at the hair, but if you're careful it's fine. The clip stays well in the hair. I think it's a little overpriced for one hair clip, but it is a fun clip. Pretty sequins
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Target Audience:** Focused on children's products for young girls, particularly whimsical themes like butterflies, mermaids, and unicorns.
- **Shopping Preferences:** Values affordability, practicality, and aesthetics, seeking hair accessories that are safe, gentle on delicate hair, and user-friendly for children. The user has shown concern over pricing for single items, indicating a preference for multi-pack options to enhance cost-effectiveness.
- **Occasion-Focused:** Interested in products that elevate special event experiences while merging functionality with appealing designs, especially suitable for festive settings.
- **Style Preference:** Prefers accessories that add charm and thematic flair to a child's look, combining functionality with a polished finish.
- **Satisfaction Indicators:** Prioritizes comfort and secure fit in accessories to prevent tangling or discomfort, particularly for fine hair textures; maintains a discerning perspective on the balance between functionality and cost.
- **Social Engagement:** Values products that attract positive attention, facilitating memorable shared experiences and enhancing social interactions for both her and her child.
- **Purchase Timing:** Engages in seasonal and occasion-driven shopping, actively seeking budget-friendly items that delight her child while providing comfort during celebrations. The user remains critical of individual item pricing, reinforcing her emphasis on obtaining good value for her purchases.

This latest interaction reflects the user's continued dedication to finding products that satisfy her child's interests while balancing budgetary considerations.
